attributes.action: Require any MP who breaks the law to be removed as an MP.
attributes.additional_details: the moral right to make laws requires that you follow them.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require any MP or Peer convicted of a criminal offence be removed from office: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600515

Stop people with a criminal conviction serving as an MP: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603692
